goals__remit:
We are growing the robotic business in Lithuania by making Lithuanian robotic sector well known to the international players 
 
We are creating local networks and placing to work together across the value chain 
 
We are prioritizing robotics sector and addressing national policy challenges, that restrict from pursuing robotics growth potential
relevant_communication:
Horizon 2020 ReconCell project (http://www.reconcell.eu/) - received grant to perform feasibility study on Lithuanian digital innovation hub for robotics (2016-2017) 
Horizon 2020 L4MS project (http://www.l4ms.eu/) - project partner (2017-ongoing) 
Registered on Catalogue of DIHs (http://s3platform.jrc.ec.europa.eu/digital-innovation-hubs-tool)  
EU-wide events and consultations: 8th European Innovation summit (2016), Smart Regions with Smart robots (2017), I4MS event on DIHs (2017)
